ja531:10.1: Abbhūti → abbhū hi (bj) | abhūti (s2, s3) | abbhu hi (pts1)
ja531:10.4: akantaṃ kantumicchasi → akanto kantamicchasi (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja531:24.1: nūnāyaṃ sā → nūna ayaṃ (bj, s2, s3)
ja531:44.3: lambissati → lambahīti (pts1), siṅgālo → sigālo (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja531:45.4: Siṅgālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhissanti → siṅgālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhayanti (bj) | sigālasaṅghā parikaḍḍhayanti (s2, s3) | gayhā vako gacchati yenakāmaṃ (pts1)
ja531:53.1: Sace ca ajja → tvaṃ amma (bj) | saceva ajja (s2, s3) | tvaṃ ajja (pts1), dhāresi → vāresi (pts1)
ja531:55.1: ca sisati → asso hasisati (bj) | asso hasiyati (s2, s3) | asso ca siṃsati (pts1)
ja531:58.4: sabbe vadhissati → yo no dukkhā pamocaye (bj) | yo ne sabbe vadhissati (s2, s3) | so no sabbe vadhissatīti (pts1)
ja531:59.2: Andhabālā pabhāsasi → ādu bālāva bhāsasi (bj, pts1)
ja531:68.2: duhanti vīsatiṃ → duyhanti vīsati (bj, pts1) | dūhanti vīsati (s2, s3)
ja531:69.4: na naṃ → na taṃ (bj, pts1), akkhāsidhāgataṃ → akkhāsi āgataṃ (bj) | akkhāsi māgataṃ (s2, s3)
ja531:79.2: pahu → bahuṃ (bj, pts1, mr) | bahu (s2, s3), titikkhisaṃ → titikkhissaṃ (pts1)
